wikipedia_page.main: Marc Mallett (b. Belfast) is a Northern Irish broadcaster and journalist.  He is a newsreader and reporter at UTV, and the Northern Ireland correspondent for ITV News.

response: *Marc Mallett IPR Award - News Broadcaster of the Year 2007
* Marc Mallett, Northern Irish television presenter and journalist
* Marc Mallett, Northern Irish broadcaster and journalist

link_mentions.page: List of ITV journalists and newsreaders
List of ITV News on air staff

response: |Marc Mallett chairs an election debate featuring representatives from the Democratic Unionist Party, Sinn Féin, Ulster Unionist Party, Social Democratic and Labour Party and the Alliance Party on UTV. The debate is also aired nationally on ITV, and viewed by an audience of 27,000.
